## sanityAdapter variable

Adapter for Sanity image URLs.

**Signature:**

```typescript
adapter: import('@yoot/yoot').Adapter;
```

## Remarks

Supports `cdn.sanity.io` URLs and maps `yoot` directives to Sanity parameters.
